comments:
the faq here:
http://www.eclipse.org/eclipse/faq/eclipse-faq.html#users_3

does not mention that running eclipse 3.0+ requires java 1.4

newcomers ask questions about this. the typical problem is:
"java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: javax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory
    at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
"

*laugh*

The following is the official Eclipse Project FAQ.
Last Modified: November 19, 2002

I'll see what we can do to get someone to update this FAQ.

The faq really needs to be updated with the speed at which things happen w/
Eclipse.  It would be really nice if we could point people to it instead of
saying check the mailing list/archive/bugzilla/website/.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 102324 ***
